showScoreExcerpt: "Thoroughly rewarding and accomplished, both in conception and execution...The play is a thrilling maze of adventures, yes, but it is also a moving and sophisticated exploration of the turbulent tides of adolescence...Even Potter-phobes could be seduced by both the tale itself and the production's technical brilliance...Tiffany...ushers us through the story's convolutions with an almost awe-inspiring fluidity.
